thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 44 of 2268
thread.title: Nicola

author: Nicola
title: Nicola
text: This is my second time of ordering blinds from blinds 2 go and I would honestly do it again and again. The choice is brilliant, both times I got samples which were delievered quickly and with no fuss. They always fit well and good quality and easy to fit as well with clear instructions. My only issue was with UPS who kept trying to deliever my parcel and took 3 attempts of them saying that I had given them the wrong address before finally getting it. No issues with blinds 2 go themselves though.
